amendment.description: An amendment numbered 75 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to strike vertiport from the AIP definitions section.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike vertiport from the AIP definitions section.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 45 - 387 (Roll no. 360).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Perry.
